meanings.definition: Not divided or shared out among a number of recipients.
meanings.sent1: The undistributed candy was all for me.
meanings.sent2: The undistributed toys were left in a pile.
meanings.sent3: The undistributed cookies seemed to be calling my name.
meanings.sent4: The undistributed happiness in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The undistributed treasure gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The undistributed papers were neatly stacked on the desk.
meanings.sent2: The undistributed leaves were still in a pile on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The undistributed marbles rolled around in the jar.
meanings.sent4: The undistributed stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The undistributed seeds waited patiently in the packet.
